title: Activate VoLTE support for Orange Romania
content:
Hello,

I have spoken to an Orange representative and they've triggered a provision for VoLTE (only VoLTE, he said that Wifi Calling is not provisioned for the Pixel 3 yet). 

The SIM itself is working with VoLTE as using it into a different Samsung phone works. But on the Pixel 3 I cannot get the menu item in settings to enable "Enhanced 4G LTE mode". 

Furthermore in the *#*#INFO#*#* Phone Information menu, the "VoLTE Provisioned" option is greyed out and going into IMS Service Status, I see "Voice over LTE: Unavailable". Both screenshots attached.

I have manually added the IMS APN required for IMS Registration, but the phone does not want to use it. I have double checked with Orange Romania and they told me VoLTE should work on the Pixel 3!

Please advise on how to enable this.

Regards,
Ionut
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
